{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRTP54G |revision= |upc=745883564903 |ean= |asin=B0009P657S |price= |est_release_date=05/13/2005 |fcc_date=03/11/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=Q87-WAG54GV2M |ic_id=3839A-WRTP54G |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETV1060;TNETV1060GDM, 54PC808; |cpu1_cspeed=165 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064M90TFIR4 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V64S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 5-pin header |wi1_module=CyberTAN WM610-T |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Dual channel telephone line interface;Legerity;Le88221;Le88221DLC V A G 0518HAB;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:39,00:13:10 |oui_eth=00:13:10,00:16:B6,00:18:39 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-G Broadband Router with 2 Phone Ports''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRTP54G}} WRTP54G serial numbers would seem to start with '''CJJ0'''. A unit with a S/N of '''CJJ0'''1F716421 has the following... *a '''Texas Instruments''' TNETV1060ZDW (TNETV1060) processor *a '''Spansion''' 8MB Flash (S29GL064M90TFIR4) and 16MB RAM (2x '''MIRA''' P2V64S40ETP-G6) *silkscreened text of "3763-14140201R" on the main board *'''HERMEI''' capacitors *a 00:18:39 OUI on the external MAC label and internal Mini PCI wireless module label *Country of Origin noted as China *All blue LEDs {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRTP54G_v1.0}} :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=275119 On the DD-WRT forums] :[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/rtp300_and_wrtp54g On the OpenWrt wiki] :[http://www.marceloeiras.com.br/dicas/wrtp54g/wrtp54g_hack.html Alternative Firmware and Hacking the Linksys WRTP54G-NA (in Spanish)] ::"3762-14141506" is silkscreened on the board. [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRTP54G_router On Wikipedia] This router is used with Vonage. The default SSID is '''linksys'''.
